title: Riot mousepad has a crease in the middle
body: I bought a mousepad from riot and it came yesterday however when I opened the package I noticed there were visible creases in the middle of the mousepad I sent a ticket to riot but they havent replied what do i do?

replies.body:
Wait for your ticket reply. Support are the only ones who can really help you here.

(Don't bump your ticket unless you have to add more information as you'll be dropped back to the bottom of the queue)
